original_solution_mapping.L1: His partner has been teaching for 40-10=<<40-10=30>>30 years
original_solution_mapping.L2: So together they have 40+30=<<40+30=70>>70 years of experience

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 79.
    Returns: the combined teaching experience of James and his partner.
    """
    # L1
    james_years = 40 # James spends 40 years teaching
    partner_less_years = 10 # 10 years less
    partner_years = james_years - partner_less_years

    # L2
    combined_experience = james_years + partner_years

    # FA
    answer = combined_experience
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: His partner has been teaching for {james_years}-{partner_less_years}=<<{james_years}-{partner_less_years}={partner_years}>>{partner_years} years
So together they have {james_years}+{partner_years}=<<{james_years}+{partner_years}={combined_experience}>>{combined_experience} years of experience

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: His partner has been teaching for 40-10=<<40-10=50>>50 years
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So together they have 40+50=<<40+50=90>>90 years of experience

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
